author: Special Correspondent
text:
Students of Fashion Technology and Costume Designing of Shrimati Indira Gandhi College in Tiruchi displaying the 225-metre 'mega fashion garment’ on Friday. —Photo: B.Velankanni Raj

A mega garment made of 225 metres of cloth was displayed at Shrimati Indira Gandhi College here on Friday. It was the outcome of the hard work of a group of final year students and the alumni of the Department of Fashion Technology and Costume Designing of the college.

The students and the alumni worked on the garment for about 10 days. The garment is 36 feet in height and 18 feet in breadth.

According to college sources, it has been planned to seek entry in the Limca Book of World Records.
title: Tiruchi college students produce a mega garment
